<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1745159_growhive_contactandsupport</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>AutoAssignCases</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, gForm, gUser, gSNC) {
    current.status = "Progress";

    var caseDept = current.department;
    gs.info("Case Department: " + caseDept);

    var empGR = new GlideRecord('x_1745159_growhive_employees');
    empGR.addQuery('emp_department', caseDept);
    empGR.query();

    var minCases = Infinity;
    var selectedEmp = null;

    while (empGR.next()) {
        gs.info("Found employee: " + empGR.emp_name + " (" + empGR.sys_id + ")");

        var caseGR = new GlideAggregate('x_1745159_growhive_contactandsupport');
        caseGR.addQuery('assignedto', empGR.sys_id);
        caseGR.addQuery('status', '!=', 'Completed');
        caseGR.addAggregate('COUNT');
        caseGR.query();

        var count = 0;
        if (caseGR.next()) {
            count = parseInt(caseGR.getAggregate('COUNT'));
            gs.info("Case count for " + empGR.emp_name + ": " + count);
        }

        if (count < minCases) {
            minCases = count;
            selectedEmp = empGR.sys_id;
            gs.info("New best match: " + empGR.emp_name);
        }
    }

    if (selectedEmp) {
        current.assignedto = selectedEmp;
        gs.info("Assigned case to: " + selectedEmp);
    } else {
        gs.warn("No employee found for department: " + caseDept);
        // current.assignedto = 'fallback_sys_id'; // For testing
    }

})(current, gForm, gUser, gSNC);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-21 08:08:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fcd7c132837222101c27e270ceaad3cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoAssignCases</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GrowHive" source="x_1745159_growhive">90f75e3a831e66901c27e270ceaad3f4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GrowHive">90f75e3a831e66901c27e270ceaad3f4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fcd7c132837222101c27e270ceaad3cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-21 08:43:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fcd7c132837222101c27e270ceaad3cf"/></record_update>
